backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a contact request storage system with functions to submit, retrieve by ID, and list all contact requests using a Map-based store with auto-incrementing IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: adding a visually appealing background with warm amber/orange color scheme, and updating the contact email to hellotalentblaze@yahoo.com.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the single-page Talentblaze application with hero, about, services, contact sections, SEO optimization, and warm amber/orange branding.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode color variables using neutral tones (no amber/orange in CSS variables themselves).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card tags, canonical URL, and JSON-LD structured data for Talentblaze's fractional talent acquisition services.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all search engine crawlers unrestricted access to index the entire site.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component composing HeroSection, AboutSection, ServicesSection, ContactSection, and Footer into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section explaining fractional talent acquisition model with value proposition cards highlighting cost effectiveness, flexibility, India market expertise, and proven processes.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with form submission using React Query mutation, displaying email (hellotalentblaze@yahoo.com) and location cards, with success state handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright, year, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component with gradient background, decorative icons, and CTA buttons that displays the Talentblaze branding and value proposition for fractional talent acquisition services in India.
Services section component that displays core recruitment services (end-to-end recruitment, talent strategy, process optimization, etc.) and specialized offerings for startups and global companies in a card grid layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the ICP actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for contact request operations including submission mutation and queries to fetch all or individual contact requests from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables defining a warm amber/orange theme for both light and dark modes, plus gradient backgrounds and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH colors, Inter font family, container settings, border radius variables, shadows, and animations for accordions.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking 15 versions of a Talentblaze website for fractional talent acquisition services targeting Indian startups and global firms. Contains 10 implemented features including homepage, about/services/contact sections, visual theming, and data replacement with known issues about placeholder data and contact number display.
